channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Polka
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: VIP Entry
item.description:
The 'VIP Entry' comes with one Polka Black watch face and one Orchid strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-resi..

Price: $50.00
